name: Quaver Beatmap
summary: Learn about .QUA files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Quaver includes an Editor that allows players to create their own beatmaps. To create a beatmap, players select an .MP3 file and then create one or more maps associated with that song.

Each beatmap has its own difficulty, and may have different included notes and timing points. Individual beatmaps are saved as QUA files. However, players most often interact with complete mapsets, which include one or more difficulties' worth of QUA files and their associated MP3 file.

instructions: You can open a QUA file in Quaver (Windows, Mac). To do so, first import the file as part of a Quaver mapset (.QP file). Then, open the Quaver Editor, begin editing your mapset, and select Open .qua file. This will allow you to select and open the QUA file you want to edit.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
